phrs.translation: 毒妇, 随便的女人, 不整洁的, 邋遢的女人

sentences.sentence: So much had circumstances altered their positions, that he would certainly have struck a stranger as a born and bred gentleman; and his wife as a thorough little slattern!
sentences.translation: 环境把他们的地位更换得这么厉害，陌生人乍一看，会认定他是个天生有教养的绅士；而他的妻子则是一个道地的小懒婆！
